dao.name: QRY_HFD_REST_MN
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, room_cod, desc_rmk, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr from hfd_rest_mn where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod)

dao.name: QRY_SINGLE_HFD_REST_MN
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, room_cod, desc_rmk, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr from hfd_rest_mn where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and trim(room_cod) = trim(:room_cod)

dao.name: QRY_HFD_REST_MN_ROOM_COD
dao.statement: select distinct room_cod value, room_sna display from rvrmcod_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and end_dat >= :rent_cal_dat
